page.title: 11Modern Housing
page.content:
Housing in the village of Colerne has increased steadily during the last forty years . Several new developments have been built parallel to the High Street . The main part of the village has been declared a Conservation Area and any new plans or houses have to be approved by the local council .
One new house in the village has created particular interest. the house is in Watergates. It was designed to look like a converted farmhouse,and great care and consideration was taken into making it energy saving. The outer walls are three layers thick to keep the heat in. The design of the house ensures that even in winter the sunlight will help to heat the interior.
